root: ^You find another tall mirror, this one framed in tarnished, coiling silver. Your reflection is clear, but it isn't you. It's darker, colder... and it's smiling.

c-0: ^You reach out. Your reflection's hand meets yours at the glass. A jolt of cold power flows into you, but you feel a creeping, parasitic sickness. (+2 Random Stats; Curse: Healing received -10% for 3 fights)
c-2: ^You ignore the reflection and walk away, its silent, mocking grin following you until you turn the corner. Nothing happens.

STR_Check_Success: ^You smash the glass. Your reflection shrieks. Among the shards, you find one that pulses with dark energy. (Got [Rare: Mirror Shard])
STR_Check_Fail: ^You strike the glass, but it doesn't even crack. Your reflection just laughs at the feeble attempt.
